Geophysics¶

Datasets¶

The geophysics datasets include:

  • National Geophysical Compilation
  • Ground Gravity
  • Airborne Geophysics
  • The University of Adelaide Magnetotelluric (MT) data
  • Seismic surveys
  • Geological Survey of Western Australia - geophysics data collection
  • Electromagnetic surveys in Australia

Notebook examples¶

The Jupyter notebook examples in geophysics domain include:

MT¶

  • Magnetotellurics (MT) data and software at NCI
  • Convert MT ASCII time series to NetCDF
  • Plotting EDI using MTpy
  • MT bulk processing

National Geophysical Compilation¶

  • Access data using NetCDF4 library
  • View/manipulate NetCDFs in python

Seismic¶

  • Work with HDF and NetCDFs
